    • Method Detail

      • createEmptyModel

        public static org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model createEmptyModel(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.node.URI contextUri)
        Create an empty RDF2Go model with some useful namespaces predefined. Please make sure that you use a contextURI which defines this event uniquely within it's stream.
        Parameters:
        contextUri - RDF context URI for quads.

      • createEmptyModel

        public static org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model createEmptyModel(String contextUri)
        Create an empty RDF2Go model with some useful namespaces predefined. Please make sure that you use a contextURI which defines this event uniquely within it's stream.
        Parameters:
        contextUri - RDF context URI for quads.

      • createEmptyModelSet

        public static org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.ModelSet createEmptyModelSet()

      • createRandomEventId

        public static String createRandomEventId()
        Create a random event ID. The returned ID is a URI string in namespace EVENTS and is randomized using UUID.randomUUID().
        Returns:
        a URI string to be used as event ID.

      • createRandomEventId

        public static String createRandomEventId(String prefix)
        Create a random event ID. The returned ID is a URI string in namespace EVENTS and is randomized using UUID.randomUUID().
        Parameters:
        prefix - an alphabetical(!) string possibly used to identify events by your application in a simple way
        Returns:
        a URI string to be used as event ID.

      • addNamespaces

        public static org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.ModelSet addNamespaces(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.ModelSet modelSet)
        Add a set of commonly used namespaces from PLAY.

        Add a set of commonly used namespaces from PLAY.

      • addLocationToEvent

        @Deprecated
public static void addLocationToEvent(Event event,
                                 double latitude,
                                 double longitude)
        Deprecated. Use setLocationToEvent(Event, double, double).
        Add latitude and longitude to an existing event object. This method simplifies the process of creating a random node, etc, for the n-ary predicate. Calling this method overrides any previous :location property.

      • setLocationToEvent

        public static void setLocationToEvent(Event event,
                      double latitude,
                      double longitude)
        Add latitude and longitude to an existing event object. This method simplifies the process of creating a random node, etc, for the n-ary predicate. Calling this method overrides any previous :location property.

      • setLocationToEvent

        public static void setLocationToEvent(Event event,
                      String locationResource,
                      double latitude,
                      double longitude)
        Add latitude and longitude to an existing event object. This method simplifies the process of creating a new node, etc, for the n-ary predicate. Calling this method overrides any previous :location property.
        Parameters:
        event -
        locationResource - A URI string which is used for the geo:Point. This parameter may be null to create a random URI.
        latitude -
        longitude -

      • addLocation

        public static void addLocation(Thing1 thing,
               double latitude,
               double longitude)
        Add a geo:location (i.e. a point with latitude and longitude) to an existing Thing. This method simplifies the process of random node, etc, for the n-ary predicate Thing -> lat, long. Several calls to this method add several geo:location properties.

         org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.ModelSet modelSet)

        Parameters:

        modelSet -

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • toJenaNode

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Node toJenaNode(String object)
        Create a Jena node from a string. This makes a few checks if the string can be a URI, a literal, etc.

      • builder

        Set the event ID URI. DEFAULT: createRandomEventId()

      • builder

        public static EventHelpers.Builder builder()
        Set no event ID URI. The default is used. DEFAULT: createRandomEventId()

      • builder

                           boolean usePrefix)
        Set a known prefix for a randomized event ID URI. DEFAULT: none
